name: Six Magic Doors
description:
Ad for “Six Magic Doors” Inc. found in a magazine:
“Do you have a tough decision to make and you have no clue as to what to do? Do not worry! Come to our wonderful building and get all the advice you desperately need! The only thing required is a die and the will to choose your destiny! Coming to our office is the first step towards making the best decision: your decision!”

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, whose theme was "roll of the dice".

You can download a better music in the files, but you'll have to mute the game and loop said music in your player.

(Seriously, you will need a die. And a Cornelian choice.)

Credits :
Ambre Dautry : game design, narration, art.
Choléra : music.

Created on Bitsy Game Maker : https://bitsy.org/
